programme.title: Pats labākais
programme.desc: Zvejas kuģa "Finestkind" apkalpei jādodas bīstamos ūdeņos, lai atmaksātu parādus.

programme.title: Bestsellers
programme.desc: Untumains pensionēts rakstnieks negribīgi sāk piedalīties savas pēdējās grāmatas veicināšanas kampaņā, lai izpalīdzētu jaunai izdevējai.

programme.title: Melnais lācis
programme.desc: Radošu krīzi piedzīvojoša filmu veidotāja meklē vienatni kādā lauku retrītā, taču saprot, ka mežs tikai piešķir spēku viņas iekšējiem dēmoniem.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Grāmatu zagle
programme.desc: Filma "Grāmatu zagle", kuras pamatā ir pasaulē populārs romāns, ir stāsts par neparastu, enerģisku meiteni, kuru Otrā pasaules kara laikā Vācijā nosūta dzīvot audžuģimenē. Meiteni ieintriģē vienīgā grāmata, ko viņa paņēmusi līdzi, tāpēc viņa sāk kolekcionēt grāmatas. Ar savu jauno vecāku un zem kāpnēm mītošā slepenā viesa palīdzību meitene iemācās lasīt un izveido brīnumainu pasauli, kas iedvesmo viņus visus.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Filmu "Ledus laikmets" un "Ledus Laikmets 2" varoņi ir atgriezušies - gatavi jauniem piedzīvojumiem. Skrets joprojām nododas nenotveramās zīles medībām. Menijs un Elija gaida mazuļa piedzimšanu, sliņķis Sids mēģina iztēloties ģimenes dzīvi, rūpējoties par nočieptām dinozaura olām, bet zobenzobu tīģeris Djego apsver, vai viņš nav kļuvis pārāk mīkstčaulīgs, tik daudz laika pavadot draugu kompānijā. Dodoties glābt nelaimē nokļuvušo Sidu, draugi nokļūst neparastā pazemes pasaulē, kur aci pret aci sastopas ar dinozauriem un ir spiesti cīnīties gan ar zvēriem, gan augiem.

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Brīvības skaņa
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir neticami patiess stāsts par federālo aģentu Timu Balārdu, kurš veltījis savu dzīvi cīņai ar bērnu tirdzniecību. Pēc jauna zēna izglābšanas no nežēlīgiem bērnu tirgotājiem Balārds uzzina, ka zēna māsa joprojām ir gūstā, un nolemj uzsākt bīstamu misiju viņas glābšanai. Viņš pamet savu oficiālo darbu un dodas dziļi Kolumbijas džungļos, liekot savu dzīvi uz bīstamas spēles, lai atbrīvotu sagūstītos bērnus no likteņa, kas ir briesmīgāks par nāvi.

programme.title: Vēl viens šāviens
programme.desc: Filma seko jūras kājinieku komandas līderim, kas eskortē aizdomās turētu teroristu. Operācijas laikā viņus sāk apšaudīt algotņi.

programme.title: Bostonas slepkava
programme.desc: 60. gados Bostonu pārbiedē virkne nežēlīgu slepkavību, kuru upuri ir sievietes. Spītējot tā laika uzskatam par sieviešu lomu sabiedrībā un viedokli, ka daiļā dzimuma pārstāvēm jāraksta par modi un izklaidi, nevis jāšķetina nopietni noziegumi, Loreta un viņas kolēģe Džīna Koula atklāj, ka Bostonā notikušās sieviešu nožņaugšanas ir savstarpēji saistītas un tās paveicis sērijveida slepkava. Loreta slepkavu nodēvē par "Bostonas žņaudzēju", četru rakstu sērijā atklājot satraucošas likumsakarības un iestāžu kļūdas, kas ļāva slepkavam nekontrolēti darboties.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Madagaskara
programme.desc: Kā lauvam, zebrai, žirafei, nīlzirgam, bariņam pingvīnu, lemuru un pērtiķu tikt cauri Eiropai, nepievēršot sev lieku uzmanību? Alekss, Mārtijs, Melmans, Glorija un viņu draugi pievienojas ceļojošajam cirkam, cerībā atkal nokļūt mājās, Ņujorkā. Melmens iemācīsies staigāt pa virvi, karalis Džūljens neglābjami iemīlēsies... Īsi sakot - viņu mājupceļš būs īsts cirks!

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Biogrāfiska drāma par izcilās ASV dziedātājas un aktrises Džūdijas Gārlendas dzīvi. Gārlenda 1968. gadā, gadu pirms savas nāves, devās uz Eiropu, lai koncertētu Londonā. Filmā attēloti pēdējie mēneši kinozvaigznes dzīvē, pirms viņa izdarīja pašnāvību.

programme.title: Mošķu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kas jauns mošķu pasaulē? Kāzas! Ragana un viņas iemīļotais Renfīlds, grāfa Drakulas sulainis, nolēmuši neslēpt savas jūtas un... salaulāties! Taču nupat sākusies laulību ceremonija tūdaļ pārtrūkst. Viesu acu priekšā mīlētājus nolaupa ar pārcilvēciskām spējām apveltītā mošķu medniece Mila. Šai mazulītei labāk netuvoties. Viņa ir ātrāka par vēju un apgādāta ar vismodernākajām tehnoloģijām - tās ieraugot, pat Džeimss Bonds viņu apskaustu.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Līdz pēdējam
programme.desc: Filmu "Amerikāņu skaistums" un "Optimista stāsts" veidotāji piedāvā uz patiesiem notikumiem balstītu stāstu par leģendāro bokseri Viniju Pacienca, kurš 1991. gadā cieta smagā autokatastrofā, gūstot smagu mugurkaula traumu. Kamēr ārsti nesolīja neko labu un ieteica Vinijam aizmirst par sportista karjeru, viņš pilnīgā slepenībā sāka apmeklēt sporta zāli un jau pēc trim mēnešiem atgriezās ringā.

programme.title: Tumšākā stunda
programme.desc: Kad Otrā pasaules kara laikā Ādolfa Hitlera varenā Vērmahta armija plosās Eiropā, Lielbritānijas premjerministrs Nevils Čemberleins ir spiests atkāpties no amata, savā vietā iesakot Vinstonu Čērčilu. Jau pašā premjera darbības sākumā Čērčilam jāizlemj, vai vest miera sarunas ar Vācijas diktatoru vai cīnīties ar šķietami neuzveicamo nacistu režīmu aci pret aci, lai ko tas arī prasītu. Neraugoties uz grūto un iespējami bīstamo lēmumu, Čērčilam nav citas izvēles, kā mirdzēt savas valsts tumšākajā stundā.

programme.title: Bēdīgi slavenie mērgļi
programme.desc: Vāciešu okupētajā Francijā Šosanna Dreifusa kļūst par liecinieci tam, kā nacistu pulkvedis Hanss Landa noslepkavo viņas ģimeni. Šosannai par mata tiesu izdodas izsprukt un aizbēgt uz Parīzi, kur viņa pieņem citu identitāti un kļūst par kinoteātra īpašnieci. Tajā pašā laikā kaut kur citur Eiropā leitnants Aldo Reins sapulcina grupu ebreju kareivju, kuru mērķis ir atriebties ienaidniekam. Nacistiem šis grupējums kļūst pazīstams ar nosaukumu "mērģļi". Reina grupējumam pievienojas jauna vācu aktrise un slepenā aģente Bridžeta fon Hameršmarka, kuras uzdevums ir gāzt Trešā reiha vadoņus. Likteņa pavērsieni saved visus kopā ar Šosannu, kurai ir pašai savs atriebības plāns….

programme.title: Arkādija
programme.desc: Nikolass Keidžs atveido tēvu, kurš pasaules gala laikā, nomaļā lauku sētā, kopā ar saviem dvīņu puikām cīnās par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ir pagājis labs laiks kopš Ziemassvētkiem, kad Makkalisteru ģimene, dodoties brīvdienās, pirmo reizi aizmirsa mājās Kevinu. Šos Ziemassvētkus Kevins nolēmis pavadīt sava tēta bagātās draudzenes Natālijas milzīgajā savrupmājā. Taču mierīgais vakars viņam kārtējo reizi izvēršas par īstu piedzīvojumu, jo Natālijas māju svētkos nolēmuši apciemot zagļi. Starp citu, vienam no viņiem ar Kevinu ir kārtojami veci rēķini!

programme.title: Ķieģeli pa ķieģelītim
programme.desc: Animācijas filma "Lego" klucīšu stilā par Farela Viljamsa dzīvi. Filmā, kurā galvenās lomas ierunājis pats Farels Viljamss (Pharrell Williams), kā arī Kendriks Lamārs (Kendrick Lamar) un Džastins Timberleiks (Justin Timberlake), ķieģelīti pa ķieģelītim tiek pārskatīta mākslinieka karjera.

programme.title: NBA. Chicago Bulls - Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. FC Barcelona - Partizan
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Zug - ZSC Lions
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Renovation Impossible

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: David and Lauren are both lawyers living in Atlanta. Theyre expecting a child and are ready for a change of pace, so theyre moving to the Savannah Isles. They want to be close to downtown Savannah, but also want to work from the beach.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Human Genesis. Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Have you heard about the warrior bear who helped the allies win WWII? Or how about the real-life hobbit humans in ancient Indonesia? What if I told you gerbils were recruited to fight crime in Canadian jails?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Famous jailbreaks are the stuff of legend as their true stories are often untold. Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." Hosted by Academy Award® winner Morgan Freeman, each episode will unearth every step of an inmates meticulous plan, the escape route and the intense manhunt that immediately followed.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Sightings of the Yeti, a creature of myth and legend, has been recorded for thousands of years throughout the Himalayas and surrounding regions. Could this creature be hiding in plain sight? And if the Yeti does exist, what is it exactly?

Now, with dramatic recreations, dynamic storytelling and cutting-edge visual effects, escapes from prisons like Alcatraz will come to life in graphic detail in the new nonfiction series "Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman." Hosted by Academy Award® winner Morgan Freeman, each episode will unearth every step of an inmates meticulous plan, the escape route and the intense manhunt that immediately followed.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Sightings of the Yeti, a creature of myth and legend, has been recorded for thousands of years throughout the Himalayas and surrounding regions. Could this creature be hiding in plain sight? And if the Yeti does exist, what is it exactly?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: There are men in America who must still make their living off the land; hunting and trapping to provide for their families. They are MOUNTAIN MEN. Their very survival is predicated on utilizing ancient skills perfected over hundreds of years. This series features a variety of men from Appalachia to the Rocky Mountains to Alaska and follows them as they race against winter to obtain the sustenance and money needed to make it through the coldest months of the year. Eustace Conway lives deep in the mountains of North Carolina on the "Turtle Bay Reserve." He moved here two decades ago in search of a more "truthful" existence. In the years since, hes built a home, and survived by hunting, fishing and raising animals. Tom Orr lives with his wife on the Yaak River in Montana. He is 100 miles from the nearest town, a place he hasnt ventured to in 10 years. John is a trapper by trade and to prepare for winter, he must earn enough money to obtain the supplies he needs. Marty Meierotto, his wife Dominique and their daughter Noah live in the small Alaskan town of Two Rivers. Every month, Marty pilots his bi-plane, traveling into the bush in search of the wolverine and lynx pelts he needs to make a living. While hes on the Black River, he must hunt moose and caribou to survive in the wilderness. Together, they represent Americas true MOUNTAIN MEN.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Have you heard about the warrior bear who helped the allies win WWII? Or how about the real-life hobbit humans in ancient Indonesia? What if I told you gerbils were recruited to fight crime in Canadian jails?

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Sunshine State Steals. Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Travel the globe alongside modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, and go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: An FBI cold case that has laid dormant for 70 years leads a group of world-renown investigators on the ultimate manhunt to finally answer the question: Did Adolf Hitler survive World War II? In early 2014 the FBI declassified hundreds of confidential documents showing that Hitler may have not committed suicide but rather escaped to South America after the fall of Germany. A memo from J. Edgar Hoover himself states "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Armed with the most cutting edge technology and these newly released FBI files the team will approach this case like a modern death claims investigation. Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.desc: Travel the globe alongside modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, and go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

Whether they are investigating a mysterious Nazi lair deep in the Argentinian jungle or diving for evidence of a missing U-Boat that could of shuttled Hitler to South America our team will focus on the tried and tested tenants for solving a fraudulent death case: follow the money where was the subject last seen, eyewitness reports, make contact with known associates and forensics.With declassified worldwide intelligence providing a wealth of new clues and modern technology never before available we reopen this world famous cold case in hopes of solving the mystery surrounding the demise of one of the biggest criminals of all time.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Travel the globe alongside modern-day warrior, Terry Schappert, and go inside the culture of some of the most famous warriors of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and, ultimately, their psyche.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monsters possible demise is investigated by Robert Rines, who saw remains while mapping the lake floor. MonsterQuest uses ROVs, sonar, and cameras in search of evidence for Nessies death at the lakes bottom.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In Texarkanas marshy swamp, a legendary beast haunts a small Arkansas town, immortalised in "The Legend of Boggy Creek". Violent nocturnal attacks and remarkable tracks left fear and panic in its wake.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Recent sightings around Alaska match native stories of a vicious Arctic mermaid that attacks unsuspecting people. With only five per cent of the worlds oceans explored, could a sinister mermaid be among the oceans undocumented creatures?

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A thirteen hour series which focuses on the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars with Rome which ultimately led to the decline and fall of the Roman Empire. This series is centered on the campaigns and battles with the barbarian tribes and extensive examinations of the reigns of little known Roman emperors and generals. The significance and structures of key barbarian tribes and the roles their leaders played are explored in detail. Territorial changes to the Roman Empire caused by unrelenting wars, plagues, mass starvations and power struggles are presented in chronological historical context with extensive re-enactments. This series examines how the continuous wars with the barbarians and depletion of resources became a core cause of the Roman Empires decline and eventual collapse.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Digging for the Truth
programme.desc: Etched into the driest desert in the world, the mysterious lines and figures of Nasca in Southern Peru are invisible from the ground. In fact, these huge drawings were not discovered until the 1930s. Ever since, they have intrigued the world.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, a small island may hold the clue to unravelling the mystery of the legendary Sasquatch. Natives told tales to their children of an ape-like beast to be feared that would steal them should they venture into the forest.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ancient Discoveries
programme.desc: Have a look at the technologies from the past. You will be surprised to find out in what extent ancient knowledge influences modern technology. The truth about the past is much more complicated and fascinating than we imagine. This eye-opening series is filmed on location in Italy, Greece, Egypt, Holland, and England, and other locations of the world where historical events actually happened, and with the help of computer animation ancient machines and mechanisms are reconstructed. As well the series uses contributions from archaeologists and other experts, footage of historical sites and artifacts and dramatized reconstructions.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome. Location shooting, CGI, and graphics are pulled from past History series Ancient Impossible and Ancient Discoveries, and lists are organized by themes. The stories are augmented by new entries fueled by the History archive. Episodes include updated "Top Ten" graphics and new interviews that provide "wow" facts and explain why something made the list. The lists will have organizing principles so it doesnt seem arbitrary. Episodes could include the following: Top 10 Secrets of Egypt, Top 10 Ancient Vikings, Top 10 Greek Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Weapons, Top 10 Ancient Monuments, Top 10 Ancient Ships, Top 10 Torture Devices, Top 10 Roman Inventions, Top 10 Ancient Swords, and Top 10 Ancient Sieges.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Decoded
programme.desc: Even the most common, ordinary objects in the modern world and history may contain secret messages, steeped in codes and symbols. These mysterious ideas and theories come directly from the mind of best-selling author Brad Meltzer, who uncovered them during his research for his fictional thrillers. In each episode, Brad poses these questions to a group of elite researchers, who will travel far and wide to examine the clues and decode the hidden meaning behind these seemingly innocuous origins. They will canvas the darkest reaches of the world to connect dots toward revealing a deeper truth.

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.desc: Created by Ghost Adventures Zak Bagans, star of the popular US paranormal show, Help My House Is Haunted is a ghost-hunting series where paranormal investigators search for paranormal entities. Some familiar faces like Barri Ghai, founder of The Ghostfinder Paranormal Society and and the shows investigator and paranormal tech expert, as well as world renowned psychic Chris Fleming join Jayne Harris, Paranormal Researcher. They travel the UK and visit houses and petrified families troubled by hauntings, and using the latest technology try to capture never before seen proof of the paranormal.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Death by Fame
programme.desc: Sex therapist Amie Hardwick had the beauty and brains to charm Hollywood. But, when one star rises, anothers deadly obsession is never far behind.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.

programme.title: Breaking Homicide
programme.desc: The most tragic crimes are the ones that never reached a conclusion, lives have been lost and no one ever held accountable as the case eventually goes cold. What happens when years pass by with no justice? Police Detective Derrick Levasseur and Forensic Psychologist Kris Mohandiewill are on a mission to reopen cases and find answers for the victims and loved ones who need to finally feel peace. Theyll be looking into cases such as Michelle OKeefe and Devan Schmidt murders, re-examining old clues and sourcing new ones, will they be able to find details that have previously been missed?

programme.title: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series exploring chilling crimes committed by sisters. Produced by Khloe Kardashian, possibly one of the most famous sisters in the world, and no stranger to sibling conflict, the series explores cases where sisters have worked both in tandem and against each other. With interviews from law enforcement officials involved in the respective cases at the time of investigation, Twisted Sisters reveals the chilling brutality of these violent atrocities, and shows how officers unraveled the sisters relationships to help them solve the case.

programme.title: Home Sweet Homicide
programme.desc: Home. Its the place where we feel safe, secure, loved and at peace. But not all homes are so lucky. No matter how many locks, bolts, alarms and cameras we install, if someone wants to get in, theyll find a way. This true-crime documentary series reveals murders committed inside peoples homes, showing how twisted individuals invaded the private sanctuaries of American citizens to brutally slay them in their humble abode. Detectives share their experiences from working on these cases, dissecting their abnormalities and presenting the peculiar pieces of evidence that baffled them as they attempted to identify the culprit.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Every day, countless adults utilize the internet with insidious intentions to groom, sexually exploit, and abuse children online. Committed to helping law enforcement stop these perpetrators, child advocate Roo Powell and the team at her nonprofit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) work in collaboration with law enforcement to detect and identify the menacing adults who use the internet to harm children. Undercover Underage follows Roo as the 38-year-old mother of three transforms her appearance into a teen online. Once adults engage with Roos underage decoys, its a race against the clock to gather enough information to positively identify the offenders and get them on law enforcements radar.

programme.title: Homicide City: Charlotte
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series. Charlotte is North Carolinas most populous city, a metropolis with a hot, subtropical climate. But underneath its warm facade lay a cold underbelly of criminal activity, a world detective Gary McFadden knows all too well. Now retired following a 34-year career with the Charlotte Mecklenburg Police Department (CMPD), the decorated officer, along with his colleagues, retells some of his most memorable and chilling cases. These brutal crimes sent shockwaves through the city and the officers relive some of Charlottes most unforgettable and harrowing murders.

programme.title: Who the Hell...
programme.desc: Shocking revelations ensue in this deceptive documentary series, where marital relationships built on lies are examined, revealing cases of betrayal, bemusement, and sheer audacity. Featuring dramatised reconstructions and interviews with the spouses involved, each episode tells a story about a particular relationship that has fallen apart after an outrageous discovery. These husbands and wives thought they were marrying their soulmates, but after noticing something peculiar about their better half, they decided to investigate further, revealing cases of double-lives, criminal activity, even sinister killings.

programme.title: Evil Stepmothers
programme.desc: True crime series. When parents separate or divorce it is always tough for the children. So when a father finds a new partner and welcomes her to the family, how can you be sure if she is as amiable as first appearances suggest? These harrowing real stories, along with re-enactments, reveal how step-mothers can change from friendly parental figures, to abusive and even murderous family members. Featuring tales from across the United States, these brutal and vicious women make Cinerallas stepmother look like a saint, and truly support the old saying: you cant judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Evil Talks: Chilling Confessions
programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Feuds Turned Fatal
programme.desc: Two friends fall out over a stolen bicycle. Petty arguments become physical fights, ending in a bloody and brutal showdown that leaves one man dead.

programme.title: Feuds Turned Fatal
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, 2009, two men come face to face over a woman - three years of feuding end in 13 fatal seconds. Decades on, neither family can forgive.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: This team of detectives are determined to detain the dangerous killers that they are faced with. What may initially seem like the "perfect murder" requires a great depth of investigation and dedication, but eventually the detectives crack them open and reveal the truth. The key to their success is their great level of persistence, and imaginative investigative skills. Dead ends wont deter the team, when a seemingly impossible case lands on their desks, they always find a way in the end.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Just because a case is closed doesnt mean the truth has been revealed. Suicide or murder? Runaway or kidnapping? Accidental or premeditated? Each episode of STILL A MYSTERY re-examines a single crime case where unanswered questions still remain. Through original interviews with law enforcement, family members and private investigators, news footage and social media, STILL A MYSTERY dissects the evidence and presents new theories in a quest to uncover the truth.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A captivating documentary series exploring real-life murder cases, and as the evidence slowly unfolds, viewers are left guessing the identity of the killer. Each episode flashes forward to the engrossing courtroom proceedings, whilst in the meantime the mystery of the chilling murder is slowly being unravelled, and each new clue presents a possible new culprit. With each twist and turn, the truth begins to emerge, before a damning piece of new evidence or testimony flips the case on its head once more.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: If you looked into the eyes of a killer, would you know? In American Monster, you find out. For the first time, viewers get closer than ever to some of Americas most shocking and surprising crimes. Filled with never-before-seen footage of these devils in disguise, from home movie shots of them playing with their kids to musical performances at high school, from the church cook-out to the wedding video, American Monster interweaves twisting-turning stories of astonishing crimes, with behind-the-scenes footage of killers at their seemingly most innocent.

programme.title: Who Hired the Hitman?
programme.desc: The assassination of a computer genius leads detectives down a rabbit hole of missing gold, a sheiks assistant, and a deadly international scheme.

programme.title: Signs Of A Psychopath
programme.desc: Series about the most notorious killers in modern history. An analysis of news images and statements made by the killers themselves shows how they worked. Explore the evil signs that every psychopath has got and follow the real archive footage.

programme.title: Как стать Елизаветой
programme.desc: План лорда-протектора по примирению наследников лишь толкает Кэтрин и Томаса к осуществлению своих замыслов. Прикрытием для них служит 15-летие Элизабет.

programme.title: Как стать Елизаветой
programme.desc: Праздник окончен, и Элизабет одинока в окружении незнакомцев. Она в ужасе от мысли, что кто-нибудь узнает, что случилось в Челси.

programme.title: Турция. Империя Эрдогана
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. Этот документальный фильм, снятый в преддверии всеобщих выборов в мае 2023 года, рассказывает о битвах, которые Эрдоган вел на своем пути к власти. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов. Многие полагают, что Эрдоган сделает все, чтобы остаться у власти.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: В США создано устройство, которое поможет контролировать уровень алкоголя в крови. Как технологии помогают предсказывать сход лавин в горах, а ферменты помогают в борьбе с глобальным потеплением. Кто виноват в отравлении белоголовых орланов?

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Ученые придумали, как выявлять поддельные лекарства с помощью мобильного телефона. В новом исследовании доказывается, что астма помогает в борьбе с опухолью мозга. Побываем на презентации автомобиля, работающего на водородном топливе

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Как искусственный интеллект используется в кинодубляже. Почему человек на природе чувствует себя менее напряженно, чем в городе? Когда и за счет чего человек сможет победить вирус папилломы? Кому сложно быть позитивным в "самых счастливых странах мира".

programme.title: Хор
programme.desc: Юру приняли в Хор! Но Грачев ставит жесткое условие — Юра должен выучить наизусть все партии Хора и освоить сольфеджио. На репетицию Хора приходит телевизионный режиссер Лаптев, любимчик министра культуры. Хор приглашают выступить на концерте "Песня года" с "Песенкой крокодила Гены". Вместо Кеши, Грачев назначает солистом скромного Кузнечика. Но вскоре у Кузнечика начинается возрастная мутация голоса… и солистом становится Юра.

programme.title: Хор
programme.desc: 1972 год. Однажды услышав песни Робертино Лоретти, 12-летний школьник из Люберец Юра тоже начинает петь. Сначала он стесняется этого, ведь пение, по мнению его сверстников и некоторых взрослых, — совсем не мужское занятие. Но, благодаря наставничеству молодой учительницы музыки Варвары, Юра развивает свой талант и решается пройти прослушивание в хор Грачева. У руководителя хора есть всего месяц, чтобы расширить состав исполнителей и подготовить новую программу для участия в телефестивале "Песня года".

programme.title: Злые люди
programme.desc: 1895 год. Нижний Новгород готовится к крупнейшему торговому событию года — ярмарке. Но в размеренной и благополучной жизни города происходит громкое убийство богатейшего человека — предводителя губернского дворянства Нефедьева. Распутать это дело берётся сотрудник нижегородского сыска Алексей Лыков. Шаг за шагом он сталкивается со злом, выходящим за рамки его понимания. И чтобы его победить, он ставит на кон всё: любовь, честь и даже свою жизнь.

programme.title: Злые люди
programme.desc: 1895 год. Нижний Новгород готовится к крупнейшему торговому событию года — ярмарке. И чтобы его победить, он ставит на кон всё: любовь, честь и даже свою жизнь.

programme.title: Желание сердца
programme.desc: Магазин Aarete Laega много лет помогает товарами первой необходимости людям, находящимся в наиболее уязвимом положении. Однако трудные времена и постоянно растущее число нуждающихся привели к тому, что маленькое НПО уже не справляется с потоком клиентов.

programme.title: Ремонт на сдачу
programme.desc: Знакомимся с веселой супружеской парой Вирко и Ханной. Стиль их квартирки в Саку можно описать как "слепили из того, что было". Но для Мерлин и Кейли нет ничего невозможного: через 2 недели квартира станет настоящей жемчужиной Саку.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Евгения и ее друзья ищут пропавшего Карского. Поиски приводят Евгению в элитный пансионат "Винтаж", где проживала родная тетя Карского Полина Ивановна Мещерякова, о которой героям даже не было известно. Однако Евгения даже не успевает познакомиться с пожилой дамой - за минуту до их встречи тетю Карского обнаруживают мертвой. Окружающим эта смерть кажется естественной, но Евгения уверена - это убийство, и оно напрямую связано с исчезновением Сергея. А вскоре в пансионате "Винтаж" происходит еще одно преступление. С помощью необычного яда отравлены главный врач и его жена. Кому и чем они могли помешать?

programme.title: Анатомия убийства

programme.title: Следствие вели...
programme.desc: Эти уголовные дела гремели на весь Советский Союз. По ним были написаны романы и сняты художественные фильмы. Их фигуранты — миллионеры эпохи социализма, хитроумные воры, профессиональные грабители и валютчики. Они бросили вызов советскому обществу. Вызов приняли лучшие сыщики страны. В их распоряжении не было компьютеров, сотовой связи и бойцов ОМОНа. Но это не мешало вершиться правосудию. Банда "Черная кошка", дело банды советских гангстеров конца 60-х годов, прозванных "Фантомасами", увлекательная история налетчика Леонида Пантелеева, "свободного художника-грабителя" — эти случаи вошли в историю отечественной криминалистики. Но главная цель сериала — не просто рассказать о преступлениях и злоумышленниках советского времени, а показать ушедшую эпоху так, чтобы молодые зрители смогли прочувствовать дух ушедшего времени, а зрители постарше — ностальгию по прошлому.

programme.title: Гоголь. Страшная месть
programme.desc: Две сотни лет назад малороссийские хутора разоряла шайка нехристей во главе с могущественным колдуном. С тех пор рыщет в окрестностях Диканьки неизвестный Чёрный Всадник, ловит молодых девушек и жестоко расправляется с ними, будто мстит за что. И следующей его жертвой может стать Лиза. Чтобы спасти возлюбленную, писарь Николай Гоголь должен разбить злые чары и победить древнее проклятье. Ни одному из смертных ещё не удавалось это, но к счастью, на помощь Гоголю приходит гениальный сыщик Яков Гуро, и у него уже есть главный подозреваемый…

programme.title: Музыкальная интуиция
programme.desc: Уникальное шоу, в котором 10 незнакомцев делают вид, что умеют петь, хотя на самом деле это утверждение правдиво лишь наполовину. Двум звёздным командам из комиков и музыкантов предстоит провести расследование, чтобы отличить певцов от лжецов и выиграть главный приз, который затем отправится в благотворительные фонды.

programme.title: Турция. Империя Эрдогана
programme.desc: Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган - самый противоречивый президент в современной истории Турции. Его правление привело как к массовому повышению уровня жизни, так и к почти полному контролю над судебной системой и СМИ. Этот документальный фильм, снятый в преддверии всеобщих выборов в мае 2023 года, рассказывает о битвах, которые Эрдоган вел на своем пути к власти. В нем представлены захватывающие свидетельства из первых рук бывшего президента Абдуллы Гюля, бывших премьер-министров, партийных лидеров, деятелей оппозиции, аналитиков и журналистов. Многие полагают, что Эрдоган сделает все, чтобы остаться у власти.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
programme.desc: Елена Ворохтина больше всего на свете мечтает о детях. Но будучи бесплодной, она пытается уговорить мужа Александра усыновить ребенка. Тот всегда находит отговорки. Вот и на этот раз он отказывается сопровождать жену в детский дом, ссылаясь на важное соглашение, а сам в это время ведет свою любовницу в ресторан. По дороге домой Елена замечает на мосту девушку, которая пыталась покончить жизнь самоубийством и уговаривает ее отказаться от необдуманного шага. Оказалось, что едва не погибшую беременную Варю бросил некий Алекс, и теперь ей негде жить.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает
programme.desc: Зачастую говорят, что успешным можно быть лишь в одной жизненной сфере. Главная героиня сериала не исключение. У нее собственный бизнес, она уверенная в себе женщина, но что касается материнства - здесь ее поджидал провал. История, которая вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о том, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа. Елена успешная бизнес-вумен, но, к сожалению, ей неведома радость материнства. В прошлом она совершила ошибку. Женщина потеряла своего ребенка, но при этом сделала счастливыми другую семью. После этого она не может иметь детей, желает лишь одного - взять ребенка из детдома. Ее супруг категорически против такого решения. Любимый человек ее предает, но надежды на чудо не оставляют ее. Этастория вмещает в себе все: и любовь, и предательство, и надежды, и веру, и о то, как начинать жизнь с чистого листа.

programme.title: Случайных встреч не бывает

programme.title: Возмездие
programme.desc: Артур Волков - беспринципный, богатый, дерзкий и очень успешный адвокат. Его состоятельность и финансовая независимость может позволить мужчине любую блажь. Для Волкова не существует стандартов на профессиональном поприще. Он специалист, который выигрывает практически все заседания и за щедрое вознаграждение готов защищать любого подонка. После очередного триумфа в суде, мужчина возвращается в свой роскошный дом, где застает убитой супругу...

programme.title: Возмездие
