programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā

programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata puķītes Zilo Atsperīgo, Margriezīti un Mazo Rozīti, lai Isa varētu doties uz karalisku tējas pēcpusdienu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz mazajai Andreai atrast burvju lapu, kas ļauj alebrihei saņemt maģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni ir sajūsmā, kad viņu mīļākā TV zvaigzne Henks Hammers grib redzēt, kā viņi strādā. Kapteinis Turbo ir sagādājis pārsteigumu. Kad saceļas migla, komandai ir jāuzceļ bāka.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: Mēre Gudveja un Alekss ar airu laivu izbrauc līcī, lai tuvāk apskatītu vaļu mazuli. Bet tuvojas vētra, varoņi zaudē kontroli pār airu laivu, un tā tiek pūsta uz jūras pusi. "Ķepu patruļai" viņi jāizglābj. // Pārgājiena laikā Raiders ierauga, ka āzis Gārbijs iestrēdzis uz kraujas. Viņš cenšas izglābt Gārbiju, bet pats nokļūst briesmās. Viņš zvana, lai lūgtu palīdzību kucēniem, bet viņam izkrīt ķepofons.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns ir apņēmies uzzināt, no kurienes ir nācis, bet dīvaini laika apstākļi un mežonīgas jūras traucē viņam ar komandu atrast citus haizivsuņus

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Kad no vienas no olām izšķiļas haizivsuns Āmurgalva, Haizivsuns cenšas to noslēpt no pārējās ģimenes.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Komanda ir gatava doties uz slepeno salu, bet tad izrādās, ka Barbai ir bail kuģot pa ledainām jūrām.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Suņi uzzina, ka Celtne ir slepena skeitošanas zvaigzne! Bet, būvējot skeitparku, viņiem jārisina problēma ar cementa maisījumu. // Pilsētā ieradīsies Čārdžera mīļākā dziedātāja Sjerra Spīdošā... Ja suņi spēs uzbūvēt tuneli viņas turnejas autobusam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras ģimene taisa pinjatu par godu māmiņas dzimšanas dienai, taču tā aizlido! Vai viņi to atradīs, pirms pārnāks māmiņa? Garnadzis nočiepj neredzamības segu un sāk čiept visu pēc kārtas. Dorai viņš jāaptur!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isu apciemos Rāpuļu karaliene, bet dārzā valda nekārtība! Dora palīdz Isai gatavoties Karalienes vizītei. Dora iepazīstas ar sliņķi Semiju, kuram jāpagūst laikus nokļūt dienas nometnē, lai visus pārsteigtu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku. Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Šodien būs pirmā skolas diena... Ja Rabla komanda pabeigs būvēt skolu! Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Kad milzu zaķis sagrābj Dereku, komandai viņš jāglābj, pirms tas atgriežas savā alā. Zaķu mīlestība uz kliņģeriem noved pie sarežģītas situācijas, kad akmens vīri visā pilsētā sacenšas par zaķu pēdējo kliņģeri.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Draudzības diena! Kad Ātrmeistara dāvana Makrupuča kungam noiet greizi, viņam jālūdz Rabla komandas palīdzība. Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Kad izšķiļas pārējie divi haizivsuņi un nejauši ielien Maksa skolas somā, Haizivsuns cenšas viņus atgūt.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Makss un Haizivsuns izdomā veidus, kā trenēt haizivsuņus, lai mamma un tētis atļautu viņiem palikt.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns ir apņēmies uzzināt, no kurienes ir nācis, bet dīvaini laika apstākļi un mežonīgas jūras traucē viņam ar komandu atrast citus haizivsuņus

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph is freaking out! He wanted to fight everyone, but now hes up against his brothers, and its the worst. Kitsune and her gang the Purple Dragons captured Mikey, Donnie, and Leo and used mind control devices to send them into the Mutant Battle Arena. They chase Raph through the arena and out to the street where he uses the Turtle Tank as a getaway car. Raph realizes hes in too deep and must turn to an unlikely source for help - the snobby Pigeon Pete! Together, they form a multi-step plan in which Pete will steal the mind control devices right from under the Purple Dragons noses while Raph distracts all the Mutants in the arena. But things dont go quite as planned and its up to Raph to save everyone he loves! Can he find a way to disarm the mind control devices and save everyone before its too late?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Ray Fillet is attacked in Central Park by a mutant turtle! Donnies busy with his robotics project: turning Metalhead into a spider-bot. Wingnut bursts in and tells the Turtles to come quick- Ray is hurt! A woozy Ray blames the Ninja Turtles, and the Mutanimals start a fight with the confused brothers. But when Rays REAL attacker appears, a mutant snapping turtle named TOKKA, he fights everyone... until his watch starts beeping and he escapes. The Turtles tail him, ending up on the Staten Island ferry. After a big fight, Tokkas trapped. But while questioning him, Tokka explodes into OOZE, leaving only a baby turtle and his watch. Donnies brothers ask him to hack it and find clues about Tokka, which he says is impossible! Later, Donnie gets a location pin from Wingnut and follows it to an abandoned factory on Staten Island. He finds her and ANOTHER TOKKA that he cleverly takes out! Donnie thinks theyre safe until MORE Monster Mutanimals emerge! Could Donnies day get any worse?"

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Still eager to impress Captain Perfect, Max volunteers to help him with his younger sister, a headstrong girl who seems to drawn to evil. Max tries to show her the benefits of being good, but she tricks him and heads to auditions for new Mastermind henchmen. Max disguises himself and goes the auditions, too, hoping to stop her from working for a supervillain. Both he and the young girl are chosen to prove their evil and destroy Splat by Sea, but Max reveals his identity to her and talks her out of being a villain just before the restaurant is ruined. Meanwhile, Phoebe convinces BC he needs an elaborate dance-posal to ask Chloe to the school dance, but her interference does more harm than good.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: Wylde Pak

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Eager to prove himself, Jack volunteers to run the Groom and Board alone for the day. Its supposed to be a chill day with no appointments - but the phone wont stop ringing! Unable to say no, Jack ends up taking in a chaotic giant snake, and multiple smaller pets - whom the snake sees as her dinner. Jack struggles to protect the little pets (and Halmoni) from the jaws of death.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max decides to surprise Phoebe on one of her solo missions, only to discover that she has been secretly teaming up with Captain Perfect. When Max hears Captain Perfect discuss his plans for the Thundermans with someone else, he realizes that the mystery supe is keeping a secret from them. After confronting Captain Perfect, the Thundermans are told by him and President Kickbutt that the new supe was sent to Secret Shores to spy on the twins, and to decide whether they should be allowed to stay on their mission. Meanwhile, Chloes crush invites her to his fathers product launch party at Splat By The Sea, at the same time Jinx and Booch want Chloe to protest the wealthy family outside the party. Unable to hurt anyones feelings, Chloe tries to use her powers to be in two places at once.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leonardo finds himself the accidental hero in a subway station, saving the lives of innocent bystanders, hes thrilled by the title of HERO. This pushes him to a life of crime-fighting vigilantism, starting with putting the Purple Dragons in their place. But when hes caught on camera and his brothers and April see this Turtle-shaped hero on the news, they interrogate him: whats he up to... and can they get in on it? Now, the four Night Ninjas and April suit up and set out to rid the streets of crime in a single night. Now whats left to do? April finds a dog-napping ring thats been snatching up purebreds. Baiting the dog-nappers with a fancy pooch, the Turtles track the criminals and meet the villainous French florist known as... La Fleur! She and her band of hench-florists are using the dog-napping as a cover-up for a much larger crime. And when the Night Ninjas show up to stop her, it may be too late for Leo and his brothers as the whole thing goes up in flames... literally.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force

Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnies trapped in a mad scientists lab by the Monster Mutanimals Tokka, Rahzar, Scale Tail, Antrax and Wyrm who are after Wingnuts blood. Meanwhile, Leo, Mikey and Raph try to get pizza but the shop owner is furious: theyve made a mess of the place too many times! But the Turtles have never been there before! Theyre confused until another Tokka wrecks the place in a huge fight before exploding into ooze...and then another Tokka arrives! In the lab, Donnie plans his escape but stumbles upon a video of Rahzar who explains the Monster Mutanimals are doomed unless they find the blood of a stable mutant... and they need Donatellos help! A real-life Rahzar lunges at Donnie, who fights him off until a whole pack of Monster Mutants shows up. The other three Turtles track their Tokka to the lab but are quickly captured. Donnie can only watch as his brothers are shoved into cages... and confronted by the creator of the Monster Mutanimals, the mad scientist Jordan Perry!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob falls asleep on the bus and misses his stop, he unknowingly finds himself in a strange town that bears a striking resemblance to Bikini Bottom. Everyone in town looks familiar to SpongeBob, but it turns out, they are actually doppelgangers! Once SpongeBob realizes hes found himself in SpongeToms town of Tankini Top, he panics until SpongeTom quietly sends him back on a bus to Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob wakes up again and believes it was all a dream. // After a mix-up at the Salty Spitoon leaves Squidward with amnesia, he wakes up with a newfound tough guy persona, ""Crazy Legs"". Squidward causes trouble around town with a gang of Salty Spitoon patrons, culminating in him unknowingly leading the gang to ransack his own house! Once his house is completely destroyed, Squidward comes to his senses and rejects his new tough guy friends... until he gets hit in the head again and turns back into Crazy Legs.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is bitten by DoodleBob while studying for an exam. SpongeBob shrugs it off, mistaking it for a papercut. But under the moonlight, SpongeBob turns into a mischievous creature called the WereDoodle! As the WereDoodle, he wreaks havoc all over town, doodling on everything. Mr. Krabs leads a hunt to end the chaos, but DoodleBob arrives to apologize for WereDoodles wrongdoings and lift the curse... until Mr. Krabs gets a papercut and becomes the new WereDoodle! // Its gorilla suit day! To celebrate, SpongeBob dresses up in a gorilla suit with Patrick dressed as his handler. As they run around town, people mistake SpongeBob for a real gorilla, causing panic that leads to SpongeBob being taken off to the zoo. Meanwhile, an actual gorilla escapes the zoo, running around town causing even more havoc. The mix-up is eventually cleared-just in time for Squidward to have one final run-in with another gorilla.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.desc: Max and Phoebe are clicking as a team, celebrating another big save, and impressing Captain Perfect with their work. programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph is freaking out! He wanted to fight everyone, but now hes up against his brothers, and its the worst. Kitsune and her gang the Purple Dragons captured Mikey, Donnie, and Leo and used mind control devices to send them into the Mutant Battle Arena. They chase Raph through the arena and out to the street where he uses the Turtle Tank as a getaway car. Raph realizes hes in too deep and must turn to an unlikely source for help - the snobby Pigeon Pete! Together, they form a multi-step plan in which Pete will steal the mind control devices right from under the Purple Dragons noses while Raph distracts all the Mutants in the arena. But things dont go quite as planned and its up to Raph to save everyone he loves! Can he find a way to disarm the mind control devices and save everyone before its too late?

programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe discover that Lazlo Chance may be the evil Mastermind and enlist Chloe to help. B.C. is back from France and is transferring to Chloes school. The twins ask her to steal B.C.s ring to get into Lazlo Chances office to discover the truth about the Mastermind. Chloe steals the ring but feels incredibly guilty and hides it from her siblings. B.C. invites Chloe and her friends to his yacht for a party and to catch up. The twins discover the ring in the house and call in their parents for help, and Billy tags along. They ground Chloes powers and take her back to Hiddenville. The twins enter Lazlo Chances office and discover that Lazlo is not the true Mastermind and has been mind-controlled. Chloe runs away to B.C.s yacht to confront him about his dad. B.C. reveals to Chloe that hes the true Mastermind behind it all, and if she doesnt listen to him, he is going to hurt her friends.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: B.C. forces Chloe to steal a magical amulet hidden in a cave underneath Hiddenshores that grants him the power to steal other superheroes powers. Trying to protect her friends, Chloe obtains it for him, only for him to reveal her he turned her friends evil anyway. Max and Phoebe discover its really B.C. who is the evil master mind. Hank, Barb, and Billy return to let them know Chloe ran away. B.C. sends a drone filled with laughing gas to stop the Thundemands from coming after him, they manage to escape. Max, Phoebe, Billy, and Chloe steal a part of the amulet back, and Mastermind goes after them. In order for Chloe to save her friends, she has to reveal her secret identity to them. Chloe teleports herself and the twins back to the cave to return the crystal from the magical amulet. Mastermind follows them, and as he is not a true superhero, the cave refuses to let him have it and captures him, allowing them to take B.C. to the Hero League.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Slappy becomes a waiter at the Krusty Krab but scares off customers with his creepy demeanor. He promises Mr. Krabs that his monster friends will be coming to dine that night. Later, the restaurant is packed with monsters and Krabs is thrilled! However, Nosferatu arrives and begs Slappy to return as his servant. Slappy agrees, to Mr. Krabs disappointment - he loved the business the monsters brought in! In the end, however, he realizes that monsters pay in bugs, not cash!

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Thundermans are excited to meet High Tide, a legendary superhero who surfaces at their door after being away on an extended mission. He explains to them that he used to live in their house, and was the Protector of Secret Shores before they were. While they enjoy hearing about his adventures, things turn when High Tide says that the house is rightfully his, and they must leave. Max and Phoebe explain that they are the towns new superheroes, and while exiting High Tide promises to do whatever it takes to regain his former position. Meanwhile, Booch has convinced Jinx to join her in a water protest at the school, but they go too far and find themselves in real danger. When High Tide shows up to rescue them, he only makes things worse, forcing the Thundermans to save the day and relieve High Tide once and for all.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe and her friends face the loss of their school clubs after Max uses the funds to buy himself a hallway golf cart. In retaliation, a mystery prankster starts pulling pranks on Max, who declares he will never give in to his new anonymous nemesis. Instead, Max enlists the help of Principal Bradford from Hiddenville, who knows how to deal with pranksters after years of having Max as a student. While Bradford teaches Max how to deal with school pranks, Chloe admits to Phoebe that she is the mystery prankster, and says she will continue the pranks until Max gives up his golf cart and returns the funds to the clubs. Ultimately feeling defeated by the pranks, Max tells Chloe that he cant continue on their Secret Shores mission, and is returning home a defeated man. Chloe panics, and tells Max the truth, only for Max to reveal he already knew, and was trying to get her to admit the truth. Max agrees to return the cart if Chloe stops her campaign of pranks.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leonardo finds himself the accidental hero in a subway station, saving the lives of innocent bystanders, hes thrilled by the title of HERO. This pushes him to a life of crime-fighting vigilantism, starting with putting the Purple Dragons in their place. But when hes caught on camera and his brothers and April see this Turtle-shaped hero on the news, they interrogate him: whats he up to... and can they get in on it? Now, the four Night Ninjas and April suit up and set out to rid the streets of crime in a single night. Now whats left to do? April finds a dog-napping ring thats been snatching up purebreds. Baiting the dog-nappers with a fancy pooch, the Turtles track the criminals and meet the villainous French florist known as... La Fleur! She and her band of hench-florists are using the dog-napping as a cover-up for a much larger crime. And when the Night Ninjas show up to stop her, it may be too late for Leo and his brothers as the whole thing goes up in flames... literally.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of SpongeBobs chaotic driving, Mrs. Puff sends him away to Klopnod on an exchange student driver program. In return, she receives Peppercorn, a sea-mule, who is an excellent driver! Meanwhile, SpongeBob learns that his frenzied driving skills are perfectly suited for the Klopnodian roads (where only farm animals are allowed to drive). Squidina tags along to film their mission, then is put in a compromising position when she learns that Patrick has been eating the citys ice cream all along.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Ray Fillet is attacked in Central Park by a mutant turtle! Donnies busy with his robotics project: turning Metalhead into a spider-bot. Wingnut bursts in and tells the Turtles to come quick- Ray is hurt! A woozy Ray blames the Ninja Turtles, and the Mutanimals start a fight with the confused brothers. But when Rays REAL attacker appears, a mutant snapping turtle named TOKKA, he fights everyone... until his watch starts beeping and he escapes. The Turtles tail him, ending up on the Staten Island ferry. After a big fight, Tokkas trapped. But while questioning him, Tokka explodes into OOZE, leaving only a baby turtle and his watch. Donnies brothers ask him to hack it and find clues about Tokka, which he says is impossible! Later, Donnie gets a location pin from Wingnut and follows it to an abandoned factory on Staten Island. He finds her and ANOTHER TOKKA that he cleverly takes out! Donnie thinks theyre safe until MORE Monster Mutanimals emerge! Could Donnies day get any worse?"

programme.desc: Lils favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the cafe using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker. // Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms and set out to distinguish themselves.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

But Neptune and Triton dont get along... (Subtitled)

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The team must defeat Lizard Lips and his hungry T-Rex who threaten fans at the Important City ballpark. The team must act fast to stop a Space Pirate Captain who threatens to ruin their surprise party plans for Dereks birthday.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The penguins are inspired after witnessing a good deed executed by a zoo patron. So they set out to perform their own good deeds - penguins style. When things dont work out as planned, a domino of bad events requires fixing. // While Mort and Private stop to liberate Cheezy Bitz from the zoo vending machine they are both sucked in. Each attempt to escape fails and their only hope is to be rescued, but everyone is searching for them outside of the zoo.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic learns that Nine is using the New Yoke shard to create his dream world in a barren shatterspace called The Grim. Can Sonic convince Nine to fight with him by the Rebels side against the Chaos Council back in New Yoke, before its too late?

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic lands in the deep seas of The No Place, where pirate versions of his friends are led by Knuckled the Dredd. When Sonics hunt for the No Place Shard runs afoul of the Dredds haunted past, the crew names a new captain... Sonic!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Foes: Kowalski invents an enemy detector. As is often the case, it doesnt work, and Skipper gets his own wires crossed when he smashes it. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies as the boss bird starts to systematically clean out the zoo with the help of his new friend Hans. King Julien gets into the act by becoming Skippers friend too, going so far as to Congaga dance together. New BFF Hans is not happy with the new bromance, however. Could this be the opening the penguins need? Night of the Vesuviuses: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! Kids get to buy tickets for a zoo sleepover, a treat the animals look forward to every year! This years going to be very different, however, when the rotten Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets themselves. The zoosters plan to turn the tables, though, and exact sweet revenge on the twins. The penguins, influenced by Private of course, cant let this happen, and its a long nights journey into day as the penguins scramble to protect their one-time tormentors.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: "The lemur habitat acquires a new resident, Clemson, and King Julien loves to order him around. Maurice enjoys not having to work, but Mort remains highly suspicious of Clemson, he knows that he is up to something evil. // Kowalskis attempt to super charge his brain backfires and now hes dumber than mud. His lack of intellect starts to comprise the troops missions. Skipper, Private and Rico must find a cure for him before he hurts someone."

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
